description.narrative: Timely, effective and coordinated support for saving lives and protecting rights in Humanitarian situations, building resilience and reducing vulnerability., which contributes to Environmental Sustainability, Other Cross-Sectoral Programme Areas, Prevention And Response Services For Violence Against Children. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Developing And Leveraging Resources And Partnerships, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: D'ici 2018, les besoins en Ressources Humaines, en plaidoyer/mobilisation de fonds, en coordination des Urgences pour la mise en Å“uvre du programme sont assurÃ©s.
